column1: Smoque BBQ////Only half of our party had arrived
column2: so they wouldn't let us order. If we did
column3: they couldn't guarantee seating for our whole party. I understand that there is limited seating and it's a popular place
column4: but this rule was a pain in the butt. When the rest of our party did arrive
column5: we ordered and waited a while to be seated because the rush that walked in earlier was happily eating. Luckily
column6: they didn't prepare our orders until we had a table.
